name: polyunsaturated
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
Polyunsaturated fat or oil has a chemical structure that does not easily change into cholesterol (= a substance containing a lot of fat that can cause heart disease) because it contains several double bonds: polyunsaturated margarine/vegetable oil Compare
monounsaturated
